view_definition_query: select slt.idslumptests, slt.value, slt.date, slt.idprojects, pr.name as project, supp.idsuppliers, supp.name as suppliername, slt.idaccounts, acc.username from consulgal.slumptests as slt left join consulgal.projects as pr on pr.idprojects = slt.idprojects left join consulgal.suppliers as supp on supp.idsuppliers = slt.idsuppliers left join consulgal.accounts as acc on acc.idaccounts = slt.idaccounts
